SEARCH

Interface Article

All Known Implementing Classes:
NewsApiArticle, SimpleJsonArticle
public interface Article
Represents an article in the system. This interface defines the contract for any class that implements an article, requiring it to provide a method for accepting an ArticleVisitor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    accept(ArticleVisitor visitor)
    Accepts an ArticleVisitor that performs operations on this article.

  • Method Details

    • accept

      void accept(ArticleVisitor visitor)
      Accepts an ArticleVisitor that performs operations on this article.
      Parameters:
      visitor - the visitor that will perform operations on the article
